title: Enhancing English Communication Competencies for Corporate Leaders: Integrated IVD & Hypertext Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and workplace-related vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Customized design for managers/leaders to adapt to global work environments, combining online modules (using digital devices like tablets/PCs) with offline workshops

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can accurately reproduce key expressions after interactive video learning based on real-life business scenarios
Independently generate English problem-solving strategies in complex work situations over three times using hypertext materials
Diagnose and address individual learning weaknesses on a biweekly basis based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
